struct asmjit::SArgNode
#include <compiler.h>

Function-call ‘argument on the stack’ node.

Public Functions

SArgNode(BaseCompiler * compiler, CallNode * call, VarData * sVd, VarData * cVd)

Create a new SArgNode instance.

~SArgNode()

Destroy the SArgNode instance.

CallNode * getCall()

Get the associated function-call.

VarData * getSVd()

Get source variable.

VarData * getCVd()

Get conversion variable.

Public Members

CallNode * _call

Associated CallNode.

VarData * _sVd

Source variable.

VarData * _cVd

Temporary variable used for conversion (or NULL).

uint32_t _args

Affected arguments bit-array.
